1: וַיַּ֤עַן <sup>6030 </sup> <n>answered</n> מֹשֶׁה֙ <sup>4872 </sup> <n>And Moses</n> וַיֹּ֔אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> וְהֵן֙ <sup>2005 </sup> <n>if</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>they will not</n> יַאֲמִ֣ינוּ <sup>539 </sup> <n>But behold they will not believe</n> לִ֔י וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>or</n> יִשְׁמְע֖וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>me nor hearken</n> בְּקֹלִ֑י <sup>6963 </sup> <n>unto my voice</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יֹֽאמְר֔וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>for they will say</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>has not</n> נִרְאָ֥ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>hath not appeared</n> אֵלֶ֖יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n>

3: וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> הַשְׁלִיכֵ֣הוּ <sup>7993 </sup> <n>Cast</n> אַ֔רְצָה <sup>776 </sup> <n>it on the ground</n> וַיַּשְׁלִיכֵ֥הוּ <sup>7993 </sup> <n>And he cast</n> אַ֖רְצָה <sup>776 </sup> <n>it on the ground</n> וַיְהִ֣י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>became</n> לְנָחָ֑שׁ <sup>5175 </sup> <n>and it became a serpent</n> וַיָּ֥נָס <sup>5127 </sup> <n>fled</n> מֹשֶׁ֖ה <sup>4872 </sup> <n>and Moses</n> מִפָּנָֽיו׃ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>from before</n>

5: לְמַ֣עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>because of</n> יַאֲמִ֔ינוּ <sup>539 </sup> <n>That they may believe</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> נִרְאָ֥ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>hath appeared</n> אֵלֶ֛יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵ֣י <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> אֲבֹתָ֑ם <sup>1 </sup> <n>of their fathers</n> אֱלֹהֵ֧י <sup>430 </sup> <n>the God</n> אַבְרָהָ֛ם <sup>85 </sup> <n>of Abraham</n> אֱלֹהֵ֥י <sup>430 </sup> <n>the God</n> יִצְחָ֖ק <sup>3327 </sup> <n>of Isaac</n> וֵאלֹהֵ֥י <sup>430 </sup> <n>and the God</n> יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n>
